name: Epic Dandidoo
description: Do you do your 'do like Dandidoo? Well, Epic Dandidoo would like to have a word with you! This spectacularly showy subspecies loves to be a little bit extra, teasing its famous puffs to nigh unimaginable heights - even for its Rare cousin! The result is a mane of truly Epic proportions, which the endlessly self-confident Monster is exceptionally proud of. Work it!
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 1 day 5 hr, Enhanced Time: 21 hr 45 min
